original_title: Import restrictions on many goods, lifted
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Import restrictions on many goods have been lifted, as per an amendment to the Gazette Extraordinary No. 2312/78 dated January 01, 2023.
Committee appointed to look into SLTB season ticket fee revision
Jaffna private tuition classes banned on Friday evenings and Sundays
Donald Trump charged with 37 counts, including compromising military and nuclear secrets
“Steps being taken to obtain Cabinet approval for pilot project of cultivating cannabis”, says Dilum Amunugama
